subject: Re: [junit] regarding Servlet TestCases
msgSnippet: ... Sorry, I (and anyone else for that matter) have no time to do your R&D for you! But I suggest you go to the Cactus website
messageBody:
At 15:04 18/06/01, Pendyala Lakshmana wrote:
>Hi,
>
> We are in hurry to write TestCases for Servlets . We have no time to
>do R&D. So, Anybody can send the clear procedure to write Servlet TestCases
>?

Sorry, I (and anyone else for that matter) have no time to do your R&D for you!

But I suggest you go to the Cactus website
(http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/cactus/index.html) and learn how to use
it - it has a quite good introduction to writing servlet test cases
(http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/cactus/using.html).

Robert
